Risako

Korean: 리사코

Country:

Japan

Arai Risako

Age:
27 years old
Height:
5'4" (161 cm)
Group (2024-present):
UDTT

Introduction

Risako is a Japanese singer under SW Entertainment. She is the leader of the girl group UDTT.


She is best known for being a contestant on the South Korean reality survival show, Girls Planet 999.
